dcterms:creator: A. M. Bronstein
M. M. Bronstein
R. Kimmel
dcterms:description: The TOSCA dataset consists of 80 synthetic meshes with 9 different deformable objects, serving as a standard benchmark for evaluating simplification methods, particularly for non-smooth meshes with high curvature regions.
dcterms:title: TOSCA Dataset

dcterms:creator: Z. Wu
S. Song
A. Khosla
dcterms:description: ModelNet10 is a dataset containing 10 categories of 3D shapes, used for training and testing deep learning models in 3D shape recognition and classification.
dcterms:title: ModelNet10 Dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Booth
A. Roussos
A. Ponniah
dcterms:description: MeIn3D is a dataset consisting of 10K meshes of human faces, used for training models in 3D morphable models and face recognition tasks.
dcterms:title: MeIn3D Dataset

dcterms:creator: W. Tan
N. Qin
L. Ma
dcterms:description: The Torronto3D dataset is a large-scale mobile LIDAR dataset designed for semantic segmentation of urban roadways, providing high-resolution point clouds for urban scene analysis.
dcterms:title: Torronto3D Dataset
